name: XtGem, Inc.
description: Developer of a visual mobile site building tool designed to build and maintain mobile sites. The company's tool helps to build a fully-featured, completely-customizable mobile site in a very short period of time, enabling users to build and maintain mobile sites, even without any programming knowledge.
one_liner: Developer of a visual mobile site building tool designed to build and maintain mobile sites. The company's tool helps to build a fully-featured, completely-customizable mobile site in a very short period of time, enabling users to build and maintain mobile sites, even without any programming knowledge.
